thing-type.label: INNOVUS SmartDimmer
thing-type.description:
RAone SmartDimmer

Device Overview

Brief description here

Inclusion and Exclusion

To include the device into the network...

To exclude the device from the network...

parameter.name: config_0_1
parameter.label: 0: Maximum dim level
parameter.description: Maximum Level, a limit on the maximum level the dimmer can reach. Levels larger than 99 will simply be interpreted as 99 ie. no limit.

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Report node
parameter.description: Report Node, reports changes in level to this node id. Disabled if 0.

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: B&O IR support
parameter.description: B&O IR support is disabled if 0 otherwise enabled.

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Dimming type
parameter.description: Dimming Type, trailing edge enabled if 0 otherwise leading edge enabled.

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Dimming level duration
parameter.description: Default Dimming Level Duration, how long time it takes to dim one level in 0.01s.

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Set level duration
parameter.description: Default Set Level Duration, how long time it takes to set one level in 0.01s.

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Long dim duration
parameter.description: Long Dim Duration, time to use dimming to level 0 when double clicking. Format is the same as multilevel switch duration.

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Touch press time
parameter.description: Touch Press Time, time for presses to register as seperate and not part of a sequence, measured in 0.01s. 0 is interpreted as a 1.

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Touch Multiple Press Time
parameter.description: Touch Multiple Press Time, has no specific usage is this product, shouldn't be changed.

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Touch Hold Time
parameter.description: Touch Hold Time, time for presses to register as being held down in 0.01s. 0 is interpreted asa1.

parameter.name: config_10_2
parameter.label: 10: Network Update Interval
parameter.description: Network Update Interval, time between network updates in 256 seconds. Disabled if 0.

parameter.name: config_11_2
parameter.label: 11: Rediscover Interval
parameter.description: Rediscover Interval, time between rediscoveries in 256 seconds. Disabled if 0.

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
